content:
It's exciting that our outreach seems to be finding interested parties outside our traditional circles. They need orientation, so I just tweaked our WG's Confluence blog content.

  • I created a tag/"label" Requests-For-Corrections and added a link to it in each post. This may encourage browsing, when a visitor lands on any of our posts.
  • While writing to the diagnostic errors people I found that the best newcomer orientation is the archive of our Dec. 17 orientation, particularly the PDF of the slides.

I'll attach that PDF here, for convenience. The first 10 slides or so are a good introduction for strangers to HL7. Orientation-for-Connectathon-26-Jan-2021-FINAL.pdf
